crafting.name: Better chests recipes
crafting.desc: Adds a new recipe which allows chest to be crafted in bulk using logs.

crafting.name: Recipe for nametag
crafting.desc: Adds a recipe for nametag's using paper and iron.

crafting.name: Recipe for crafting wool to string
crafting.desc: Adds in recipe to convert wool to string.

crafting.name: Better Trapped Chest Recipe
crafting.desc: Adds an recipe for trapped chest for crafting it without chest

crafting.name: Better Repeater Recipe
crafting.desc: Adds an recipe for repeater without using redstone torch but the materials needed for it

crafting.name: Better stairs recipes
crafting.desc: Changes the recipe's for all stair to be more consistent.

crafting.name: Better stone tools recipes
crafting.desc: Changes the recipe's for all stone tools to use stone instead of cobblestone.

content.name: Dynamite
content.advDesc: Adds a new item which can be right clicked to spawn a dynamite which explodes on contact with anything.

content.name: Fried Egg
content.desc: Simply toss an egg in the furnace to produce it! It will heal 2.5 hunger bars.

content.name: Slime Finder
content.desc: A way in-game to identify slime chunks by right clicking.
content.advDesc: When right clicked indicates whether the current chunk player is in is a slime chunk.

content.name: Storage Blocks
content.desc: Storage blocks for flint, sugar, and charcoal. Charcoal blocks can be used like coal blocks.
content.advDesc: Can be crafted in 3x3 with the corresponding item.

content.name: Pedestal
content.desc: A new way to show your treasures to other!
content.advDesc:
Right click with a item to add & remove it to the pedestal.
Shift right click the pedestal to open its GUI.

content.name: Portable crafting table!
content.desc: Adds a new item which can right clicked to open a 3x3 crafting menu.

content.name: Binoculars
content.desc: A non-OP way to zoom! The amount of zoom is configurable.
content.advDesc:
Adds a new item which can be equipped in helmet slot and when equipped let's you zoom.
Has a baubles version when baubles is installed.

enchanting.name: Nimble and Hops
enchanting.desc: These enchantments go on your boots, and can go all the way up to level 3. Each level adds a bit to your movement speed and jump height, respectively.

enchanting.name: Vigor
enchanting.desc: This enchantment goes on your chestplate. It will grant the wearer a one heart max health increase per enchantment level, maximum of 3.

enchanting.name: Veteran
enchanting.desc: This enchantment goes on your head, instantly increasing your knowledge! It will attract all experience orbs in a 32-block radius towards you!

enchanting.name: Blazing
enchanting.desc: This enchantment goes on your pickaxe. Automatically smelts everything the block drops.
enchanting.advDesc:
If you have fortune on your item, it will increase the stack size of the drops accordingly - but not for drops that are blocks themselves.
It cannot be applied with Silk Touch,obviously. Only available at level 1.

enchanting.name: Siphon
enchanting.desc: This enchantment goes on your pickaxe. All mined block drops instantly go into your inventory!
enchanting.advDesc:
You won't have to deal with a pesky zombie or friend stealing your freshly-mined diamonds again!
It is friendly with Silk Touch or Blazing.

enchanting.name: Homing
enchanting.desc: This enchantment goes on your bow. Your arrows will aim right at your target which is highlighted using glow effect.
enchanting.advDesc: Level 1 works for entities 16 blocks away, level 2 works for entities 32 blocks away, and level 3 works for entities 64 blocks away.

loot.name: Named mobs drop their nametag
loot.desc: Named mobs will drop their name tags when they die.

loot.name: Bats drop leather
loot.desc: Bats now drop leather when they die.

loot.name: Creepers drop TNT
loot.desc: Creepers now has one in ten chances to drop TNT when they die.

world.name: No Pesky lava pockets in the nether
world.desc: Nether is Less Dangerous as there are no Lava Pockets.

world.name: Dropped seeds/crops now plant themselves
world.desc:
Farms can now be more easily automated!
Fabric : Seeds and saplings will try to plant themselves in the block they are on every 1 second.
Forge : Seeds will plant themselves after 6000 ticks(5mins). You can configure the chance and time it will take for seeds to plant.

world.name: Realistic predator/prey relationships!
world.desc: When ocelots kill chickens, the chickens won't drop meat! Same for wolves and sheep!

tweaks.name: Beehive and Bee nest Tooltip
tweaks.desc: Displays the honey level and number of bees in the best nest/hive when advanced tooltip is turned on

tweaks.name: Baby Zombies and Creepers burn in daylight.
Sign Editing
tweaks.desc: You can now shift right-click already placed signs to edit them.

tweaks.name: Mobs Spawners can now be silk touched
tweaks.desc: Mobs Spawners drop themselves when you break them with silk touch.

tweaks.name: Hoe harvesting
tweaks.desc:
Breaking grass or crops with a hoe will break a 3x3 of them.
A Diamond Hoe will break a 5x5 instead. A Netherite Hoe will break 7x7.

tweaks.name: Shear nametag of named mobs
tweaks.desc: Use an shear on named entity to remove its name and drop a nametag.

tweaks.name: TNT placed next to magma block or lava will ignite itelf.
Fire arrows set block on fire
tweaks.desc: Fire arrows when hit on block sets the block on fire.

tweaks.name: Potion and enchantment level roman numerals now are localized up to level 255.
Dragon eggs & Command blocks in creative inventoy
tweaks.desc:
Command blocks can be found in the redstone creative tab.
Dragon eggs can be found in the decorations tab.

tweaks.name: Squishy Sponges
tweaks.desc: Wet sponges on being squished set adjacent block as water if it's air.

tweaks.name: Swap armor with armor stand
tweaks.desc: Right click to swap armor in armour stand.

tweaks.name: Rotate item frame anti-clockwise!
tweaks.desc: Shift click on an item frame to rotate it anti-clockwise.

tweaks.name: No more GUI shifting due to potion effects
tweaks.desc: Disables GUI shifting when having potion effects.
